title: Dorothy Jane Scott // 179
description:
RE-DO EPISODE! This was originally episode 4 of Going West (which no longer exists!). We have re-researched and re-recorded it.
“When I get you alone, I will cut you up into bits so no one will ever find you”. That was call received by Dorothy Jane Scott, and the calls continued to come in both at her home and at work. On May 28, 1980, she disappeared forever. This is the story of Dorothy Jane Scott.
BONUS EPISODE
patreon.com/goingwestpodcast
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
